title: Live Firearm Training Component of the Basic Firearms Safety Certificate Requirement Report

abstracts.abstract: Report of the Executive Office of Public Safety and Security (pursuant to Section 152 of Chapter 135 of the Acts of 2024) submitting its legislative report on the Live Firearm Training Component of the Basic Firearms Safety Certificate Requirement
